Title: The Vietnamese people resist the American aggressor
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The 16th sheet of a series of 22 (incomplete). The pictorial exhibition includes quotes by Mao Zedong, photographs and cartoons.The photographs show Hồ Chí Minh (胡志明) visiting troops, anti-aircraft guns, a downed American jet fighter and a prisoner of war.
Theme: Foreign Friends: North VietnamForeign Friends: National Liberation Movements
